name: LOST TRANSMISSIONS
description:
LOST TRANSMISSIONS

Scan the stars for lost transmissions. An experiment in generative sound. Created using nim, sdl2, opengl and the flite text-to-speech library. For global game jam 2018.

Gamepad with dual analog sticks required. Best with headphones.

Left stick: Move crosshairs
Right stick ↑: Adjust movement sensitivity
Escape: Exit

Restart the game to get a new starfield to scan.
